author: craigmcc
msg: Restore further backwards compatibility that was broken by the BIG check-in:
retrieving the corresponding configuration object for the default webapp
* The ActionFormBeans, ActionForwards, and ActionMappings collections are
now created and stored under their respective context attributes keys.
The new controller doesn't pay any attention to them, but 1.0 apps
With these changes in place, Ted should be able to restore the Scaffold code
to what it was before last night's check-ins, and it should work.  Ted,

author: craigmcc
